name: $player disconnected
description:
Explore a strange pyramid and try to escape from a malevolent software in this text-based game but beware of the choices you make : the sotfware never forgets !

Game made for the LudumDare43 in 72hours by ENJMIN students.

How to play

Use your mouse to choose your next action and type some answers with your keyboard when needed ! This game is using multibranching story as its main mechanic, do not fear to replay the game, you could be surprised !

Meet the team
  • Florent Vain : Programming & the giggles
  • Hugo Bombail : Programming & stickmaster
  • Guillaume Dartoen : Game Design & cooking
  • Mélusine Wagner : Graphics & gloss
  • Jérémy Guarober : Composer & dialogue fanatic
  • Thomas Chastagnol : Sound Design & screams in the night
